actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The eleinomae makes three dagger attacks and one reed flower net attack.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Reed Flower Net
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 5/15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. Hit: The target has disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws for 1 minute, and is restrained. A creature can free itself or another creature within reach from restraint by using an action to make a successful DC 15 Strength check or by doing 5 slashing damage to the net (AC 10).

special_abilities.name: Unearthly Grace
special_abilities.desc: The eleinomae's Charisma modifier is added to its armor class (included above).

special_abilities.name: Reed Walk
special_abilities.desc: The eleinomae can move across undergrowth or rivers without making an ability check. Additionally, difficult terrain of this kind doesn't cost it extra moment.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
the eleinomae's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

at will: dancing lights

3/day each: charm person, suggestion

2/day each: hallucinatory terrain, major image

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The crocodile makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the crocodile can't bite another target.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target not grappled by the crocodile. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: The crocodile can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The kongamato makes one bite attack and two claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and the kongamato can't bite another target. When the kongamato moves, any target it is grappling moves with it.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Flyby
special_abilities.desc: The kongamato doesn't provoke an opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

special_abilities.name: Breaker of Boats
special_abilities.desc: The kongamato deals double damage to objects and structures made of wood or lighter materials.

special_abilities.name: Carry Off
special_abilities.desc: A single kongamato can carry away prey up to 50 lbs, or a single rider under that weight. A grouo of them can carry up to 100 lbs.

monsters.name: Shambling Mound
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 10

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The shambling mound makes two slam attacks. If both attacks hit a Medium or smaller target, the target is grappled (escape DC 14), and the shambling mound uses its Engulf on it.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Engulf
actions.desc: The shambling mound engulfs a Medium or smaller creature grappled by it. The engulfed target is blinded, restrained, and unable to breathe, and it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw at the start of each of the mound's turns or take 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the mound moves, the engulfed target moves with it. The mound can have only one creature engulfed at a time.

special_abilities.name: Lightning Absorption
special_abilities.desc: Whenever the shambling mound is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

special_abilities.name: Variant: Loathsome Limbs
special_abilities.desc:
Whenever the troll takes at least 15 slashing damage at one time, roll a d20 to determine what else happens to it:

**1-10:** Nothing else happens.
**11-14:** One leg is severed from the troll if it has any legs left.
**15- 18:** One arm is severed from the troll if it has any arms left.
**19-20:** The troll is decapitated, but the troll dies only if it can't regenerate. If it dies, so does the severed head.

If the troll finishes a short or long rest without reattaching a severed limb or head, the part regrows. At that point, the severed part dies. Until then, a severed part acts on the troll's initiative and has its own action and movement. A severed part has AC 13, 10 hit points, and the troll's Regeneration trait.
A **severed leg** is unable to attack and has a speed of 5 feet.
A **severed arm** has a speed of 5 feet and can make one claw attack on its turn, with disadvantage on the attack roll unless the troll can see the arm and its target. Each time the troll loses an arm, it loses a claw attack.
If its head is severed, the troll loses its bite attack and its body is blinded unless the head can see it. The **severed head** has a speed of 0 feet and the troll's Keen Smell trait. It can make a bite attack but only against a target in its space.
The troll's speed is halved if it's missing a leg. If it loses both legs, it falls prone. If it has both arms, it can crawl. With only one arm, it can still crawl, but its speed is halved. With no arms or legs, its speed is 0, and it can't benefit from bonuses to speed.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The vapor lynx makes one bite attack and two claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Poison Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The vapor lynx exhales a 40- foot radius poison fog, which heavily obscures a spherical area around the lynx. Any breathing creature that ends its turn in the fog must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1d4 + 1 rounds.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
the lynx's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can cast the following spell, requiring no material components:

3/day: gaseous form

special_abilities.name: Smoky Constitution
special_abilities.desc: The vapor lynx spends its time in both gaseous and solid form. Its unique constitution makes it immune to all fog- or gas-related spells and attacks, including its own. A vapor lynx sees clearly through light or heavy obscurement caused by fog, mist, or spells such as fog cloud.

monsters.name: Water Elemental
monsters.damage_resistances: acid; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Whelm (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc:
Each creature in the elemental's space must make a DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If it is Large or smaller, it is also grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and unable to breathe unless it can breathe water. If the saving throw is successful, the target is pushed out of the elemental's space.
The elemental can grapple one Large creature or up to two Medium or smaller creatures at one time. At the start of each of the elemental's turns, each target grappled by it takes 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. A creature within 5 feet of the elemental can pull a creature or object out of it by taking an action to make a DC 14 Strength and succeeding.

special_abilities.name: Water Form
special_abilities.desc: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

special_abilities.name: Freeze
special_abilities.desc: If the elemental takes cold damage, it partially freezes; its speed is reduced by 20 ft. until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The zmey headline makes one bite attack and one claws attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d12 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The zmey headling exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area takes 16 (3d10) fire damage, or half damage with a successful DC 16 Dexterity saving throw.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The zmey headling can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: The zmey headling reaver regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. This trait doesn't function if the zmey headling took acid or fire damage since the end of its previous turn. It dies if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.
